attributes.action: Social workers must be included in the announced public sector pay rises.
attributes.background: Social workers deserve the same pay rise offered to other public sector workers as they too have played a vital part in the country's response to Covid-19. They have continued to support vulnerable adults and children throughout this time, putting themselves at risk of catching the virus.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Parliament and Government aren't responsible for setting most social workers pay. 

They are responsible for NHS social worker's pay, so you might like to sign and share this petition instead:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/313488

You might also like to sign and share this petition:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307215
